data.textUthmani: إِذْ دَخَلُوا۟ عَلَيْهِ فَقَالُوا۟ سَلَـٰمًا قَالَ إِنَّا مِنكُمْ وَجِلُونَ
data.wordByWord: إِذْ [When] دَخَلُوا۟ [they entered] عَلَيْهِ [upon him] فَقَالُوا۟ [and said] سَلَـٰمًۭا [Peace] قَالَ [He said] إِنَّا [Indeed, we] مِنكُمْ [(are) of you] وَجِلُونَ [afraid]
data.transliteration: Ith dakhaloo AAalayhi faqaloosalaman qala inna minkum wajiloon

data.textUthmani: قَالُوا۟ لَا تَوْجَلْ إِنَّا نُبَشِّرُكَ بِغُلَـٰمٍ عَلِيمٍ
data.wordByWord: قَالُوا۟ [They said] لَا [(Do) not] تَوْجَلْ [be afraid] إِنَّا [indeed, we] نُبَشِّرُكَ [[we] bring glad tidings to you] بِغُلَـٰمٍ [of a boy] عَلِيمٍۢ [learned]
data.transliteration: Qaloo la tawjal innanubashshiruka bighulamin AAaleem

data.textUthmani: قَالَ أَبَشَّرْتُمُونِى عَلَىٰٓ أَن مَّسَّنِىَ ٱلْكِبَرُ فَبِمَ تُبَشِّرُونَ
data.wordByWord: قَالَ [He said] أَبَشَّرْتُمُونِى [Do you give me glad tidings] عَلَىٰٓ [Do you give me glad tidings] أَن [although] مَّسَّنِىَ [has overtaken me] ٱلْكِبَرُ [old age] فَبِمَ [Then about what] تُبَشِّرُونَ [you give glad tidings]
data.transliteration: Qala abashshartumoonee AAalaan massaniya alkibaru fabima tubashshiroon

words.translation: Do you give me glad tidings
Do you give me glad tidings

data.textUthmani: قَالُوا۟ بَشَّرْنَـٰكَ بِٱلْحَقِّ فَلَا تَكُن مِّنَ ٱلْقَـٰنِطِينَ
data.wordByWord: قَالُوا۟ [They said] بَشَّرْنَـٰكَ [We give you glad tidings] بِٱلْحَقِّ [in truth] فَلَا [so (do) not] تَكُن [be] مِّنَ [of] ٱلْقَـٰنِطِينَ [the despairing]
data.transliteration: Qaloo bashsharnaka bilhaqqifala takun mina alqaniteen

data.textUthmani: قَالَ وَمَن يَقْنَطُ مِن رَّحْمَةِ رَبِّهِۦٓ إِلَّا ٱلضَّآلُّونَ
data.wordByWord: قَالَ [He said] وَمَن [And who] يَقْنَطُ [despairs] مِن [of] رَّحْمَةِ [(the) Mercy] رَبِّهِۦٓ [(of) his Lord] إِلَّا [except] ٱلضَّآلُّونَ [those who are astray]
data.transliteration: Qala waman yaqnatu min rahmatirabbihi illa addalloon

data.wordByWord: قَالَ [He said] فَمَا [Then what] خَطْبُكُمْ [(is) your business] أَيُّهَا [O messengers] ٱلْمُرْسَلُونَ [O messengers]

data.textUthmani: قَالُوٓا۟ إِنَّآ أُرْسِلْنَآ إِلَىٰ قَوْمٍ مُّجْرِمِينَ
data.wordByWord: قَالُوٓا۟ [They said] إِنَّآ [Indeed, we] أُرْسِلْنَآ [[we] have been sent] إِلَىٰ [to] قَوْمٍۢ [a people ] مُّجْرِمِينَ [criminals]

data.textUthmani: إِلَّآ ءَالَ لُوطٍ إِنَّا لَمُنَجُّوهُمْ أَجْمَعِينَ
data.wordByWord: إِلَّآ [Except] ءَالَ [the family] لُوطٍ [of Lut] إِنَّا [indeed, we] لَمُنَجُّوهُمْ [surely will save them] أَجْمَعِينَ [all]

data.textUthmani: إِلَّا ٱمْرَأَتَهُۥ قَدَّرْنَآ ۙ إِنَّهَا لَمِنَ ٱلْغَـٰبِرِينَ
data.wordByWord: إِلَّا [Except] ٱمْرَأَتَهُۥ [his wife] قَدَّرْنَآ ۙ [We have decreed] إِنَّهَا [that she] لَمِنَ [(is) surely of] ٱلْغَـٰبِرِينَ [those who remain behind]
فَلَمَّا [And when] جَآءَ [came] ءَالَ [(to the) family] لُوطٍ [(of) Lut] ٱلْمُرْسَلُونَ [the messengers]
قَالَ [He said] إِنَّكُمْ [Indeed, you] قَوْمٌۭ [(are) a people] مُّنكَرُونَ [unknown]

data.textUthmani: قَالُوا۟ بَلْ جِئْنَـٰكَ بِمَا كَانُوا۟ فِيهِ يَمْتَرُونَ
data.wordByWord: قَالُوا۟ [They said] بَلْ [Nay] جِئْنَـٰكَ [we have come to you] بِمَا [with what] كَانُوا۟ [they were] فِيهِ [in it] يَمْتَرُونَ [disputing]
data.transliteration: Qaloo bal ji/naka bimakanoo feehi yamtaroon

data.wordByWord: وَأَتَيْنَـٰكَ [And we have come to you] بِٱلْحَقِّ [with the truth] وَإِنَّا [and indeed, we] لَصَـٰدِقُونَ [surely (are) truthful]

words.translation: And we have come to you

data.textUthmani: فَأَسْرِ بِأَهْلِكَ بِقِطْعٍ مِّنَ ٱلَّيْلِ وَٱتَّبِعْ أَدْبَـٰرَهُمْ وَلَا يَلْتَفِتْ مِنكُمْ أَحَدٌ وَٱمْضُوا۟ حَيْثُ تُؤْمَرُونَ
data.wordByWord: فَأَسْرِ [So travel] بِأَهْلِكَ [with your family] بِقِطْعٍۢ [in a portion] مِّنَ [of] ٱلَّيْلِ [the night] وَٱتَّبِعْ [and follow] أَدْبَـٰرَهُمْ [their backs] وَلَا [and not] يَلْتَفِتْ [let look back] مِنكُمْ [among you] أَحَدٌۭ [anyone] وَٱمْضُوا۟ [and go on] حَيْثُ [where] تُؤْمَرُونَ [you are ordered]
data.transliteration: Faasri bi-ahlika biqitAAin minaallayli wattabiAA adbarahum wala yaltafitminkum ahadun wamdoo haythutu/maroon

data.textUthmani: وَقَضَيْنَآ إِلَيْهِ ذَٰلِكَ ٱلْأَمْرَ أَنَّ دَابِرَ هَـٰٓؤُلَآءِ مَقْطُوعٌ مُّصْبِحِينَ
data.wordByWord: وَقَضَيْنَآ [And We conveyed] إِلَيْهِ [to him] ذَٰلِكَ [[that]] ٱلْأَمْرَ [the matter] أَنَّ [that] دَابِرَ [(the) root] هَـٰٓؤُلَآءِ [(of) these] مَقْطُوعٌۭ [would be cut off] مُّصْبِحِينَ [(by) early morning]
data.transliteration: Waqadayna ilayhi thalikaal-amra anna dabira haola-i maqtooAAunmusbiheen

data.wordByWord: وَجَآءَ [And came] أَهْلُ [(the) people] ٱلْمَدِينَةِ [(of) the city] يَسْتَبْشِرُونَ [rejoicing]

data.textUthmani: قَالَ إِنَّ هَـٰٓؤُلَآءِ ضَيْفِى فَلَا تَفْضَحُونِ
data.wordByWord: قَالَ [He said] إِنَّ [Indeed] هَـٰٓؤُلَآءِ [these] ضَيْفِى [(are) my guests] فَلَا [so (do) not] تَفْضَحُونِ [shame me]
وَٱتَّقُوا۟ [And fear] ٱللَّهَ [Allah] وَلَا [and (do) not] تُخْزُونِ [disgrace me]
قَالُوٓا۟ [They said] أَوَلَمْ [Did not] نَنْهَكَ [we forbid you] عَنِ [from] ٱلْعَـٰلَمِينَ [the world]
data.transliteration: Qaloo awa lam nanhaka AAani alAAalameen
